verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after נִבְנְתָה֙ <S%H1129><s%> niv-ne-Tah was built הַחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> ha-cho-Mah, Now it came to pass when the wall וָאַעֲמִ֖יד <S%H5975><s%> va-'a-'a-Mid and I had set up הַדְּלָת֑וֹת <S%H1817><s%> had-de-la-Tot; the doors וַיִּפָּ֥קְד֛וּ <S%H6485><s%> vai-yip-Pa-ke-Du were appointed הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֥ים <S%H7778><s%> hash-sho-'a-Rim and the porters וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <S%H7891><s%> ve-ham-sho-re-Rim and the singers וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim. and the Levites

וָאֲצַוֶּ֞ה <S%H6680><s%> va-'a-tzav-Veh charge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲנָ֣נִי <S%H2607><s%> cha-Na-ni Hanani אָחִ֗י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi, That I gave my brother וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲנַנְיָ֛ה <S%H2608><s%> cha-nan-Yah and Hananiah שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> sar the ruler הַבִּירָ֖ה <S%H1002><s%> hab-bi-Rah of the palace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- charge יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; over Jerusalem כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ke-'Ish man אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met, for he [was] a faithful וְיָרֵ֥א <S%H3372><s%> ve-ya-Re and feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him God מֵרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> me-rab-Bim. above many

וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar answer קלָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִפָּֽתְח֞וּ <S%H6605><s%> yip-pa-te-Chu be opened שַׁעֲרֵ֤י <S%H8179><s%> sha-'a-Rei unto them Let not the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until חֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> chom be hot הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh, until the sun וְעַ֨ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad and while הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they עֹמְדִ֛ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim and while they stand by יָגִ֥יפוּ <S%H1479><s%> ya-Gi-fu let them shut הַדְּלָת֖וֹת <S%H1817><s%> had-de-la-Tot the doors וֶאֱחֹ֑זוּ <S%H270><s%> ve-'e-Cho-zu; and bar וְהַעֲמֵ֗יד <S%H5975><s%> ve-ha-'a-Meid, [them] and appoint מִשְׁמְרוֹת֙ <S%H4931><s%> mish-me-rOt watches יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one בְּמִשְׁמָר֔וֹ <S%H4929><s%> be-mish-ma-Ro, in his watch וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and every one נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged front בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To. [to be] over against his house

וְהָעִ֞יר <S%H5892><s%> ve-ha-'Ir Now the city רַחֲבַ֤ת <S%H7342><s%> ra-cha-Vat broad יָדַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Da-yim able וּגְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> u-ge-do-Lah, and great וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am but the people מְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At [were] few בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chah; therein וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein else בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tim and the houses בְּנוּיִֽם׃ <S%H1129><s%> be-nu-Yim. [were] not builded

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten put אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai And my God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into לִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi, into mine heart וָאֶקְבְּצָ֞ה <S%H6908><s%> va-'ek-be-Tzah to gather together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֹרִ֧ים <S%H2715><s%> ha-cho-Rim the nobles וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַסְּגָנִ֛ים <S%H5461><s%> has-se-ga-Nim and the rulers וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people לְהִתְיַחֵ֑שׂ <S%H3187><s%> le-hit-ya-Ches; that they might be reckoned by genealogy וָֽאֶמְצָ֗א <S%H4672><s%> va-'em-Tza, And I found סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer a register הַיַּ֙חַשׂ֙ <S%H3188><s%> hai-Ya-chas of the genealogy הָעוֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lim of them which came up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah, at the first וָאֶמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> va-'em-Tza and found כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> ka-Tuv written בּֽוֹ׃ bo. פ Peh

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <S%H4082><s%> ham-me-di-Nah, of the province הָעֹלִים֙ <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lim that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> mish-she-Vi out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah, of those that had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> heg-Lah, had carried away נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar whom Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel; of Babylon וַיָּשׁ֧וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu and came again לִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> li-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem וְלִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ve-li-hu-Dah and to Judah אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> le-'i-Ro. unto his city

הַבָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im Who came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel, with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua נְחֶמְיָ֡ה <S%H5166><s%> ne-chem-Yah Nehemiah עֲ֠זַרְיָה <S%H5838><s%> 'A-zar-yah Azariah רַֽעַמְיָ֨ה <S%H7485><s%> ra-'am-Yah Raamiah נַחֲמָ֜נִי <S%H5167><s%> na-cha-Ma-ni Nahamani מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <S%H4782><s%> ma-re-do-Chai Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <S%H1114><s%> bil-Shan Bilshan מִסְפֶּ֥רֶת <S%H4559><s%> mis-Pe-ret Mispereth בִּגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> big-Vai Bigvai נְח֣וּם <S%H5149><s%> ne-Chum Nehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <S%H1196><s%> ba-'a-Nah; Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei of men עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <S%H6551><s%> far-'Osh, of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim thousand מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah, of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children אָרַ֔ח <S%H733><s%> 'a-Rach, of Arah שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- The children פַחַ֥ת fa-Chat מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H6355><s%> mo-'Av of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua וְיוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> ve-yo-'Av; and Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Neh and eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. teen ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam, of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children זַתּ֔וּא <S%H2240><s%> zat-Tu, of Zattu שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children זַכָּ֔י <S%H2140><s%> zak-Kai, of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H8346><s%> ve-shish-Shim. and threescore ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children בִנּ֔וּי <S%H1131><s%> vin-Nui, of Binnui שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children בֵבָ֔י <S%H893><s%> ve-Vai, of Bebai שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <S%H5803><s%> 'az-Gad, of Azgad אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children בִגְוָ֔י <S%H902><s%> vig-Vai, of Bigvai אַלְפַּ֖יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim threescore וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah. and seven ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children עָדִ֔ין <S%H5720><s%> 'a-Din, of Adin שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- The children אָטֵ֥ר <S%H333><s%> 'a-Ter of Ater לְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2396><s%> le-chiz-ki-Yah of Hezekiah תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> tish-'Im ninety וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children חָשֻׁ֔ם <S%H2828><s%> cha-Shum, of Hashum שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children בֵצָ֔י <S%H1209><s%> ve-Tzai, of Bezai שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children חָרִ֔יף <S%H2756><s%> cha-Rif, of Hariph מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children גִבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> giv-'on of Gibeon תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> tish-'Im ninety וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei The men בֵֽית־ veit- לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> le-chem of Bethlehem וּנְטֹפָ֔ה <S%H5199><s%> u-ne-to-Fah, and Netophah מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> she-mo-Nim fourscore וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei of עֲנָת֔וֹת <S%H6068><s%> a-na-Tot, of Anathoth מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek
